popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on melee attacks and protective effects
A mastery path focused on melee attacks and weakening effects

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Flee
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds.  You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

data.name: Supplication
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will convert 30 action points into 30 Righteous Fury every second.  If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Breath of Sigmar
data.note:
Requires 20 Righteous Fury
Only usable on Dead Players
data.description: Resurrects a fallen ally with 20% health.

data.name: Healing Hand
data.description: Heals your target for 1520 points over 15 seconds.

data.name: Repent
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Purify
data.note:
Requires 25 Righteous Fury
Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: You purify an ally, removing one Curse or Hex.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 25 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description:
You deal 25% more damage, but your healing output is reduced by 20%.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Atone
data.description:
All enemies within 30 feet hate you less and deal only 50% damage to you for 5 seconds. For the next 5 seconds, you will cause 25% less hate in all enemy monsters. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken.
If you attack anyone that you've Detaunted, the effect will immediately fade from them.

data.name: Beacon of Courage
data.description: Increase your Auto Attack damage by 25% and increase the damage of Bludgeon by 15%

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 1200 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Unstoppable Wrath
data.note:
Requires 45 Righteous Fury
Requires Great Weapon or Shield
data.description: Your wrath removes all roots and snares from you. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Empowered Smite
data.description: Removes the cooldown of Smite. Smite no longer gives Righteous Fury per enemy hit, instead it builds 30 Righteous Fury if it hits any target. Action Point cost of Smite reduced by 10. Range reduced by 10 feet.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Charged Fury
data.description: Whenever you hit an enemy with a melee ability, you heal your defensive target for 150 health. Can only trigger once per second.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Purge
data.note:
Builds 25 Righteous Fury
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals 127 damage.

data.name: Sacrificial Renewal
data.description: Whenever you critically heal an ally with a direct healing ability, you increase the power of your heals by 15% for 5 seconds, but you also take 10% more damage from all sources.

data.name: The Comet's Gift
data.description: Increases your Initiative by 80 and your Weapon Skill by 80.

data.name: Shield of Faith
data.description: Increases your chance to Disrupt and Dodge enemy attacks by 10%. Increases your chance to Block attacks when wearing a shield by 5%.

data.name: Divine Aegis
data.description: Increases your target's armor by 1320 and all resistances by 480 for 15 seconds.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: United in Prayer
data.description:
Prayers give group members within 100 ft of you a 20% chance on hit to increase the power of heals used on them by 25% for 5 seconds.
Does not stack with Blessing of Grungni.

data.name: Divine Replenishment
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become more driven. For the next 10 seconds, anytime they hit an enemy with a melee attack, they will regain 50 Action Points.

data.name: Exalted Defenses
data.description: Any time you defend against an attack, your healing output is increased by 20% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Blessing of Sigmar
data.description: Whenever you strike a target with Bludgeon, your Armor Penetration is increased by 15% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Endless Guilt
data.description: The snare from Weight Of Guilt will now slow down enemies for 30%, and affect all enemies within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Penance
data.description: You attack all targets within 25 feet for 1200 damage and Stagger them for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Fueled Fury
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Righteous Fury.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Divine Petitioning
data.description: Increases the amount of Righteous Fury gained from Supplication by 15 per second.

data.name: Divine Shock
data.description: The force of Sigmar's displeasure slams into all enemies in front of you, up to 30 feet away, and sends them flying backwards.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Restores 1800 health to all group members within 100 feet and increases your outgoing healing by 35% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Divine Aid
data.description: Heals an ally for 309 points, and an additional 370 over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Divine Mend
data.description:
A quick heal that restores 781 health.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Prayer of Absolution
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time
data.description: You chant a bolstering prayer, group mates within 100 feet will have a 20% chance when taking damage to activate a shield that will absorb 375 damage for up to 5 seconds. Will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Touch of the Divine
data.description: Restores 477 health to all group mates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Divine Light
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 1162 damage for each person.

data.name: Divine Warding
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 712 damage. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Word of Wisdom
data.description: Over the next 10 seconds, your direct heals will heal their target for an additional 225 health. This effect will not trigger more than once every 1.5 seconds.

data.name: Cleansing Power
data.description: Purify will also cleanse your entire group. It will not cleanse more than 1 effect per target.

data.name: Pious Restoration
data.description: You call upon Sigmar to Bless everyone in your group within 100 feet, restoring 783 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Refreshing Radiance
data.description: Whenever you heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 Action Points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Martyr's Blessing
data.description:
You open your soul to Sigmar and become a living force of holy power for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration. Each second, all allies within 25 feet of you will regain 246 health, and you will consume 20 Righteous Fury.
This effect will end if you lose your concentration or if you run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by 1320, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by 25, and all Resists by 480 for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Divine Strike
data.description: You strike your enemy dealing 202 damage to them. The divine power of Sigmar heals your friendly target for 291 health plus 75% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Sigmar's Fist
data.description: A blessed attack which deals 164 damage to your target, and increases your defensive target's Strength by 150 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Prayer of Devotion
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you attacks an enemy, there is a 20% chance that they will regain 300 health. This effect will not trigger more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Divine Assault
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, attacking their very spirit and offering it up to Sigmar's will. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing 109 Spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Sigmar's Vision
data.description:
Deals 239 damage to your enemy and Blesses your defensive target for 15 seconds, increasing their chance to parry attacks by 10%.

Additionally, when wearing a shield your chance to block will be increased by 10% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Sigmar's Will
data.description: You slam your enemy dealing 239 damage to them. The will of Sigmar allows you to heal all allies within 20 feet of your friendly target for 389 health plus 100% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Sigmar's Radiance
data.note:
Requires Shield or Tome
Builds 30 Righteous Fury
data.description: You smash into your enemy dealing 164 damage to them. The power of Sigmar erupts from your weapon, healing group mates within 100 feet for 177 health plus 75% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Vow of Silence
data.description: A powerful strike which deals 239 damage to your enemy and knocks the wind out of them for 4 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Greave of Sigmar
data.description: Sigmar's Fist will now also increase your ally's Toughness as well, and will reduce your enemy's Strength and Toughness by 150.

data.name: Sigmar's Shield
data.description: Your defensive target becomes Blessed for up to 10 seconds, and will regain 150 health each time they're attacked. You will lose 10 Righteous Fury each time this blessing occurs, and the effect will end if you run out of Righteous Fury to power it with.

data.name: Leading the Prayer
data.description: Whenever Prayer Of Devotion heals one of your groupmates, you will also become healed for the same amount.

data.name: Sigmar's Grace
data.description: The might of Sigmar infuses everyone in your group within 100 feet, increasing their Wounds by 50 for 1 hour.

data.name: Grace of Sigmar
data.description: Increases the base heal of Sigmar's Radiance, Divine Strike and Sigmar's Will by 50%. Divine Assault will now heal your allied target for 186 health every tick.

data.name: Benediction
data.description: You strike your enemy for 164 damage and surround your ally with a barrier, absorbing up to 1387 damage over 10 seconds. This attack buffs your next casted healing ability by 35% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Divine Amazement
data.description: You call upon the power of Sigmar, dealing 300 damage every second to all enemies in a 25 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Sigmar returns all the damage done to your enemies to all group members within 100 feet as health.

data.name: Judgement
data.description: You call down the holy judgement of Sigmar, dealing 127 Spirit damage to the enemy.

data.name: Bludgeon
data.description: A powerful attack which deals 202 damage to your enemy, and ignores 15% of the victim's armor.

data.name: Castigation
data.description: A strike that deals 101 damage to your enemy, and an additional 225 damage over 15 seconds, and reduces their Initiative by 150.

data.name: Weight of Guilt
data.description: Deals 239 damage to your target and snaring them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 3 seconds. If they are Cursed, the snare duration is increased to 6 seconds.

data.name: Smite
data.description:
A sweeping blow which deals 138 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 50 feet away.
Builds an additional 15 Righteous Fury for each enemy that you strike.

data.name: Prayer of Righteousness
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet hits an enemy, there is a 20% chance they will deal an additional 202 Spirit damage.

data.name: Soulfire
data.description: Deals 555 Spirit damage over 9 seconds to all enemies within 25 feet. Increases your chance to critically hit affected enemies with Smite by 10%.

data.name: Hammer of Sigmar
data.description: With the power of Sigmar, you hit your enemy with a devastating blow, dealing 427 damage.

data.name: Fanaticism
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but your healing output is reduced by 20%.

data.name: Absence of Faith
data.description: You deal 164 damage to your enemy and call upon Sigmar to Curse them for 10 seconds, causing all healing effects used on them to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Divine Justice
data.description: Prayer of Righteousness will now deal 318 Spirit damage.

data.name: Divine Impact
data.description: A devastating undefendable attack which deals 519 Spirit damage and reduces the targets ability to parry or block by 10% for 10 seconds. You cannot be set back.

data.name: Guilty Soul
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a direct damage ability or hit with Weight of Guilt, your target will suffer an additional 600 Spirit damage over 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times. Each stack of Guilty Soul on the target increases the damage of your Hammer of Sigmar by 10%.

data.name: Vanquish
data.description: You smash your hammer into your enemy for 277 damage, breaking their armor. The victim's armor is reduced by 1600 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Avatar of Sigmar
data.description: Increases the Strength, Willpower, Toughness, Initiative, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Intelligence and Wounds of all group mates withing 100 feet by 100 for 30 seconds.
